评论概述: Love this skirt! True to size!!
评论详情: This is a versatile, beautiful skirt that could go with so many different costumes. The lace makes it quite Victorian/Steampunk, and it is extremely comfortable! Do not order up a size. It is true to the sizing chart. Couldn't be happier with this purchase! 🖤
I loved the comfort and length of the skirt. It had a string inside that I was able to pull to lift the side of the skirt higher up my leg if I wanted.
This was too big overall. The color was great but it isn’t true to size. The fabric is not good quality.
Fit perfect, nice and comfortable
It did not look like the image presented. Looks too cheesy.
Fits well. I could have ordered a size down. I typically wear a 20-22 and ordered the 4x. It's comfy and easy to adjust the length of the front
Super cute skirt, but it's really stretchy and runs small. I have a 30-31 inch waist and had to order a small even though the size chart suggested a large.
It fit ok but it is made out of a weird spandex fabric and looks very costumey

This looks nothing like the picture. It's a cheap version, doesn't have the layers only one, the ruched sections on each side us missing, and the material is pretty thin. It does run large as well. I feel insulted that they would assume I wouldn't notice. Completely different skirt. I also bought it for $47.99 and they're trying to give me $44.
If you're skinny maybe it'll look better

评论概述: Great Stretchy Skirt - If your over 5ft.
评论详情: I normally wear a size 4 , I purchased a small it was a little big and I am 148. I am 5ft tall so it wasn't very flattering.  I gave it 5 stars because if I had more curves and was taller it would have been cute. It's a little long for a short person. I will be returning it.

Fast shipping. When I received this I did inspect it for rips, tears, and loose strings. Found none. The skirt fits lovely on me. I am 5'9" about 185 lbs. It has a nice stretch to it. The front for me was a little short but I wore shorts underneath and knee high stockings so it was ok. Nice red color to it, the detailing is nice too. Love the lace. No weird smells to it when I opened it. Easy to put on, nice stretch to the waistline.
Very happy with skirt.  Looks & fits great.
Perfect
I was leery of the fit so I went up a size, however because the fabric stretches it fits but loosely so I would recommend choosing your true size.

I'm 5'4" and it's very short. I expected it to be ankle length in the back. It's mid-calf. I'll add extra black lace to the hem. It's pretty cheap looking but because it's black and will be worn at night maybe not that noticeable. OK for the price.

评论概述: Perfect for my Renaissance Festival Costume
评论详情: I love this skirt!  It is great quality and was perfect for my ren fest costume.  It fits as expected.  I can use this for other costumes as well.  I would highly recommend this product!

评论概述: I’d buy it again in other colors, I love it!
评论详情: I a soul love this skirt. It’s exactly what I was looking for to complete my Halloween costume! It fits perfect, it’s stretchy and comfortable. Great buy!
it fit great and even has little give so that is nice if you wanted to tuck a shirt in.
This fit me true to size. I'm a size 20 in pants and got the 4xl and fits like a glove. Super cute for everyday wear with a black cami. I really like it alot

评论详情: Super cute and comfy! Love everything about it except the zipper - it tends to catch on nothing and makes it hard to zip up. Definitely would buy it again though!

评论概述: If you need a costume, this could work.
评论详情: This is more suited for a costume of one time ise as opposed to actual clothing.

I used this skirt as a costume for Halloween. It fit very nicely and is stretchy which was important since I have big hips. It’s flattering and doesn’t sit on my hips like a tent like other skirts do, it hugs your curves. Material is nice and very comfortable.
Fits perfect I am five four 190 lb it's very comfortable and looks nice the drawstrings to make it shorter are great quality
It fit perfect and not too short.
perfect t

Bought this for a Halloween costume and absolutely love it!  I am 5ft 3in and have a 30 in waist.  Bought the medium size.  It's just a little bit big but very comfortable.  Love the adjustable length!
Very cute skirt but it was a bit big when I tried it on. It's pretty forgiving fabric so I would suggest ordering a size down.

评论概述: Good fit if you use the size chart
评论详情: I wear these around the house because I like them. Fits as expected AS LONG AS YOU CHECK THEIR SIZE CHART. Sizing is not standard US! The fabric is acceptable but not great. Overall a fun skirt I would buy again.
Style is cute. Fit me perfect size wise. A little shorter than I would like since I will be wearing heels so will add tule to it.
I ordered a 2x according to the measurements. It was too big! Thankfully I am able to hem it to fit and conform well.

评论概述: Cute skirt stretch fabric fits fine
评论详情: Cute skirt. I normally wear an XL but ordered a L and it was just right.

I measured my waist and purchased according to the size chart. The item literally fell off of me. I exchanged it for 4 sizes smaller. Ha! It is a good quality and I like it. Especially the bustling. Perfect for what I wanted, but it does run very large.
Love this skirt! Looks just like the picture
Love the material, style, fit and versatility. Wearing it with a longer skirt underneath for Titanic event. Also great alone for steampunk or pirate skirt.

If you follow the recommended sizing chart, it’s huge. Also, it’s pull on, pull off and the material is super stretchy, so the buttons are more for show. I’m not sure how long this item would hold up for regular wear, but it’s kind of cute on.
I have a 35 inch waist and ordered by their size chart sizing is way off, it is well made. My friend who is larger loves and will wear for steampunk. It's the only reason for not sending it back.

评论概述: Adorable! Recommend ordering down one size.

Pretty skirt as described.
Really comfortable and surprisingly runs a tad large. 8/10

Really well made. Has draw ties to make skirt short or long. My only complaint is that it is not red. Burgundy color is pretty but if you want red, this is not.

Beautiful skirt! Shipped quickly. Well made. Excited to wear!
Having some stretch in the fabric, makes it fit nicely. Love that the front length is adjustable. Can't wait to wear it at the Renaissance festival. Their customer service is attentive and timely
